description.compact: Note, you have to list each class explicitely That is, descendants need to be listed as well as their parents, to exclude them both.

docblock.description: Includes override excludes. If you list includes, then only those pages will be shown. If you dont list includes, then the exclude list will be used and if this is empty all page types will be included.
